, shown in red and blue line respectively. **Left panel**: Entire range of $\tau$; **Middle panel**: For $\tau > 0.02$**Right panel**: For $0.2 > \tau > 0.02$.  (*fig:tsdistribution*)

</div>

**Figure 1. -** Comparison of inferred $T_{k}$ and $T_{s}$ from the THOR data with models from  ([ and Liszt (2001)](https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2001A&A...371..698L))  for $l_c = 2  pc$ for a comparison with the low latitude sample. (*fig:tstkcompare*)
